attributes.action: set a maximum response time of four weeks, to matters raised by a MP's constituents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been waiting TEN weeks for a response from my MP who has also not had the courtesy to reply to further reminders. With a £60,000 salary, £90,000 staffing allowance and £10,000 self-awarded communication allowance, this is totally unsatisfactory.
